page.title: 06Mr.Austen's Day At Work
page.content: I get up at 6.0a.m. I take my two Jack Russells for a walk. Then I have my breakfast and at 7.30a.m. I go to work. I work in the butcher's shop run by Mr.A.Blaber. My first job is to check that the refrigerator is working properly. Then I put the meat in the window display. I make sausages every other day. The rest of the day is spent preparing joints of meat and serving customers. Very often there is a delivery lorry which brings fresh supplies of meat bought at the local markets. I have to check the right quantity has been delivered. At about 4.0p.m. the unsold meat in the window display is returned to the coldstore. The work surfaces, mincer, bacon slicer and sausage machine all have to be scrubbed clean. At 5.30p.m. I lock the shop up and return home to my wife and two children for dinner & a rest.
